              def get_top_visited(options = {})
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          6
          
                options.reverse_merge!(filter:0, limit:10)

    6. 
          6

      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          6
          
                filter = [filter] unless options[:filter].respond_to?(:flatten) || filter.nil?
        
      8.

                filter.flatten!
        
      9.

            YOUTUBE_REGEX = /^http:\/\/www\.youtube\.com\/watch\?.*v=([-\d\w]+).*/
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          
        
      10.

            def youtube_link?
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          3
          
              YOUTUBE_REGEX.match(self.url)

      14.

          1
          
            def embed_youtube_video
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          3
          
              video_id = self.url.gsub(YOUTUBE_REGEX, '\1')
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          3
          
              if self.respond_to?(:youtube_id)
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          3
          
                self.youtube_id = video_id
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
              end
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          3
          
              self.embed_target = embed_code_for_video(video_id)

            end

          1
          
            def embed_code_for_video(video_id)
        
      23.

          1
          
            def validate_each(record, attribute, value)
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          8
          
              record.errors[attribute] << "Link is not a valid YouTube URL" unless valid_youtube_url_format?(value)

      7.

            def valid_youtube_url_format?(url)
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          8
          
              url =~ YouTubeable::YOUTUBE_REGEX || url.blank?
        
      9.

            def update_description

            def get_embed_code_from_embedly(external_link, embed_code = nil)
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          30
          
              if embed_code.blank? and external_link =~ URI::regexp(%w(http https))
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          2
          
                embed_code = EmbedlyService.get_simple_embed(external_link)
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
              end
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          30
          
              return embed_code
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
            end
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
            
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          1
          
            def verify_admin_and_content_item_admin
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
              if require_user and not current_person.admin? and not current_person.blog_admin?
        
      131.

                flash[:error] = "You must be an admin to view this page."
        
      132.

            #PUT admin/conversations/update_order
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          1
          
            def update_order
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
              # validate parameters
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
              current_position = format_param(params[:current])
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
              next_position = format_param(params[:next])
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
              previous_position = format_param(params[:prev])
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
          
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
              raise "Current position cannot be nil" if current_position.nil?
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
          
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
              if previous_position.nil?
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                set_position(current_position, 0, next_position)
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
              elsif next_position.nil?
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                set_position(current_position, 0, previous_position)
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
              elsif next_position > previous_position
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                set_position(current_position, previous_position + 1, next_position)
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
              elsif next_position < previous_position
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                set_position(current_position, next_position + 1, previous_position)
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
              end
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
          
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
              Conversation.sort
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
              render :nothing => true
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
            end
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
          
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
            #GET admin/conversations/:id
        
      107.

    118. 
          
          
            #POST admin/conversations/:id/toggle_staff_pick
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          1
          
            def toggle_staff_pick
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          4
          
              @conversation = Conversation.find(params[:id])
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          4
          
              @conversation.toggle(:staff_pick)
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
          
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          4
          
              if @conversation.save
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          3
          
                status = @conversation.staff_pick? ? 'on' : 'off'
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          3
          
                flash[:notice] = "Staff Pick is turned #{status} for \"#{@conversation.title.truncate(50)}\""
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          3
          
                @conversation.sort
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          3
          
                @conversation.move_to_position(0) if status == 'on'
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
              else
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          1
          
                flash[:error] = "Error saving conversation: \"#{@conversation.title.truncate(50)}\""
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
              end
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
          
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          4
          
              if params[:redirect_to]
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1
          
                redirect_to :action => params[:redirect_to]
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
              else
        
      135. 
      
        
    135.

                redirect_to admin_conversation_path
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
              end
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
            end

            def format_param(param)
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
              if param.match(/^\d+$/)
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                param.to_i
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
              else
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                nil
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
              end
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
            end
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
          
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          1
          
            def set_position(current, new_index, comparison)
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
              current_conversation = Conversation.find_by_position(current)
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
              Conversation.where('position >= ?', comparison).each do |conversation|
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                Conversation.where('id = ?', conversation.id).update_all(position: conversation.position + 1)
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
              end
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
              Conversation.where('id = ?', current_conversation.id).update_all(position: new_index)
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
            end
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
          
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
          end

            def update_order
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
              # validate parameters
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          8
          
              current_position = format_param(params[:current])
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          8
          
              next_position = format_param(params[:next])
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          8
          
              previous_position = format_param(params[:prev])
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          8
          
              if current_position.nil? || ManagedIssue.find_by_position(current_position).nil?
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          2
          
                raise "Current position cannot be nil and must exist"
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
              end
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
          
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
              if ((next_position.nil? || ManagedIssue.find_by_position(next_position).nil?) &&
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          6
          
                (previous_position.nil? || ManagedIssue.find_by_position(previous_position).nil?))
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          3
          
                raise "next or previous position must not be nil and exist"
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
              end
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          3
          
              ManagedIssue.set_position(current_position, next_position, previous_position)
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          3
          
              render :nothing => true
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
            rescue RuntimeError => e
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          5
          
              ManagedIssue.assign_positions
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          5

      80.

            def format_param(param)
        
      100.

          24

      101.

          13

      103.

            def create
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              @conversation = Conversation.find(params[:conversation_id])

      17.

            def update

            def load_conversation

            def fetch_embedly_information(attributes, url)
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
              attributes[:contribution][:url] = url
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
              embedly = EmbedlyService.new
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
              embedly.fetch_and_merge_params!(attributes)
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
              attributes
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
            end
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
          
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
          end

      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          12
          
              @offset = @per_page * (@page - 1)
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
          
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          12
          
              @conversation = Conversation.find(params[:id])
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
          
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
              # Added 1 to @per_page to see if there is a next page
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          12
          
              @recent_items = Activity.most_recent_activity_items(conversation:@conversation, limit:@per_page + 1, offset:@offset, exclude_conversation:true)
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          12
          
              @next_page = @recent_items.length > @per_page
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
          
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
              # if there is a next page, pop the last item because it was temporarily used to see if there is a next page.
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          12
          
              @recent_items.pop if @next_page
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
          
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          12
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          12
          
                format.embed do
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          5
          
                  @embed = true # needed to differentiate the truncation limit on the activity content length when displaying as an embed
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          5
          
                  html = render_to_string
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          5
          
                  json = {
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                    :html => html,
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                    :page => @page,
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                    :next_page => @next_page,
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                    :js => [ActionController::Base.helpers.asset_path('conversations/activities.embed.js')]
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                    }
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          5
          
                  render_widget(json)
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
                end
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
              end
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
            end
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
          
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          1
          
            def node_conversation
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
              @contribution = Contribution.find(params[:id])
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
              @contributions = @contribution.descendants.confirmed.includes(:person)
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
              @contribution.visit!((current_person.nil? ? nil : current_person.id))
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
          
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                format.js { render :partial => "conversations/node_conversation", :layout => false}
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                format.html { render :partial => "conversations/node_conversation", :layout => false}
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
              end
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
            end
        
      172.

    176.

      177. 
      
        
    177.

            # PUT /conversations/blog/:id
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          1
          
            def create_from_blog_post
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
              @blog_post = ContentItem.find(params[:id])
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
              if request.xhr?
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
                render partial: 'shared/redirect_after_xhr', locals: { url: blog_url(@blog_post) }
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
              elsif @blog_post.conversation
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
                redirect_to conversation_url(@blog_post.conversation)
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
              else
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
                params[:conversation][:summary] = "<em>This is a conversation about a blog post from #{@blog_post.author.name}: <a href=\"#{blog_url(@blog_post)}\">#{@blog_post.title}</a></em><br/><br/>#{@blog_post.summary}"
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
                params[:conversation][:title] = "Blog Post: #{@blog_post.title}"
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
                params[:conversation][:zip_code] = "ALL"
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
                prep_convo(params)
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
                if @conversation.save
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
                  @blog_post.conversation = @conversation
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
                  @blog_post.save
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
                  redirect_to conversation_path(@conversation)
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
                else
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
                  render 'blog/show'
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
                end
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
              end
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
            end
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
          
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
            # PUT /conversations/radio/:id
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          1
          
            def create_from_radioshow
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
              @radioshow = ContentItem.find(params[:id])
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
              if request.xhr?
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
                render partial: 'shared/redirect_after_xhr', locals: { url: radioshow_url(@radioshow) }
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
              else
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
                params[:conversation][:summary] = "<em>This is a conversation about The Civic Commons Radio <a href=\"#{radioshow_url(@radioshow)}\">#{@radioshow.title}</a></em><br/><br/>#{@radioshow.summary}"
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
                params[:conversation][:title] = "The Civic Commons Radio #{@radioshow.title}"
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
                params[:conversation][:zip_code] = "ALL"
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
                prep_convo(params)
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
                if @conversation.save
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          
          
                  @radioshow.conversations << @conversation
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          
          
                  redirect_to conversation_path(@conversation)
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
                else
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          
          
                  render 'radioshow/show'
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
                end
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
              end
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
            end
        
      250.

            # PUT /conversations/1
        
      252.

            # NOT IMPLEMENTED YET, I.E. NOT ROUTEABLE
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          1
          
            def update
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
              @conversation = Conversation.find(params[:id])
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          
          
          
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
              if @conversation.update_attributes(params[:conversation])
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
                redirect_to(@conversation, :notice => 'Conversation was successfully updated.')
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
              else
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          
          
                render :action => "edit", :status => :unprocessable_entity
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          
          
              end
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          
          
            end
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          
          
          
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          1
          
            def toggle_rating
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          
          
              @contribution = Contribution.find(params[:contribution_id])

      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          
          
              @rating_group = RatingGroup.toggle_rating!(current_person, @contribution, @rating_descriptor)
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          
          
              respond_to do |format|
        
      269. 
      
        
    269.

      270.

            def updates
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          
          
              @conversation = Conversation.find(params[:id])
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          
          
              @ratings = RatingGroup.ratings_for_conversation_by_contribution_with_count(@conversation, current_person)
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          
          
              @new_contribution = @conversation.contributions.new
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          
          
              @time = params[:time].to_datetime
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          
          
              @items = @conversation.activities.where("item_created_at > ?", @time)
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          
          
          
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          
          
              @contributions = @conversation.contributions.where("created_at > ?", @time)
        
      281. 
      
        
    281.

      282. 
      
        
    282.

      283. 
      
        
    283.

      284.

      285. 
      
        
    285.

      286.

          1
          
            private
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          
          
          
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          1
          
            def force_friendly_id
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          9
          
              begin
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          9
          
                @conversation = Conversation.find params[:id]
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          
          
              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          
          
                render 'public/404.html', :layout => nil, :status => 404 and return
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          
          
              end
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          
          
          
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          
          
              # If an old id or a numeric id was used to find the record, then
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          
          
              # the request path will not match the post_path, and we should do
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          
          
              # a 301 redirect that uses the current friendly id.
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          9
          
              if request.format != 'embed' and request.path != conversation_path(@conversation)
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          3
          
                return redirect_to request.parameters.merge({:id => @conversation.slug, :status => :moved_permanently})
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          
          
              end
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          
          
            end
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          
          
          
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          1
          
            def prep_convo(params)
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          9
          
              @conversation = Conversation.new(params[:conversation])
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          9
          
              get_content_item(params)
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          9
          
              @conversation.content_items = [@content_item] if @content_item.present?
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          
          
          
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          9
          
              @conversation.person = current_person
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          9
          
              @conversation.from_community = true
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          9
          
              @conversation.started_at = Time.now
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          9
          
              @conversation.contributions.each do |contribution|
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          
          
                contribution.confirmed = true
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          
          
                contribution.item = @conversation
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          
          
              end
        
      316. 
      
        
    316. 
          
          
            end
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          
          
          
        
      318. 
      
        
    318. 
          1
          
            def get_content_item(params)
        
      319. 
      
        
    319. 
          18
          
              if params[:radioshow_id] || params[:blog_id]
        
      320. 
      
        
    320. 
          4
          
                @content_item = ContentItem.find(params[:radioshow_id]||params[:blog_id])
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          4
          
                @start_from = @content_item.content_type
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          
          
              end
        
      323. 
      
        
    323. 
          
          
            end
        
      324. 
      
        
    324. 
          
          
          
        
      325. 
      
        
    325. 
          
          
          end

            def create

    22. 
          2

            def render_js_redirect_to(path = '', options={})

    112. 
          8

      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          8
          
              @script += "
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                #{isUnsafeJSPopup}
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                if(window.opener) {
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                  if(isUnsafeJSPopup() != true){
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                    window.opener.onunload = function(){
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                        window.close();
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                    };
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                    window.opener.location = '#{path}';
        
      122. 
      
        
    122.

      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                    window.opener.location = '#{path}';
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                    window.close();
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                  }
        
      126. 
      
        
    126.

      129.

      130.

          1
          
            def isUnsafeJSPopup
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
              #used to see if it's cross domain or not
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
              "isUnsafeJSPopup = function(){
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                var cross_domain = false;
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                try{
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                  cross_domain = window.opener.location.protocol != window.location.protocol;
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                } catch(e){
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                  cross_domain = true;
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                }
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                return cross_domain;
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          24
          
              }"
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
            end
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
          
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          1
          
            def render_popup(text,script = nil)
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          16
          
              render :partial => '/authentication/fb_interstitial_message', :layout => 'fb_popup', :locals => {:text => text, :script => script}
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
            end
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
          
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          1
          
            def send_person_data_to_the_opening_window(person, redirect_path)
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
              render :partial => '/plain_old_javascript', locals: {
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          1

      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
            end

          end

          class TosController < ApplicationController

            def weeks_ago_date_range_select(week_ago = 8)

            def first_week_of_month?(week)

    15. 
          122

          122

          module BlogHelper

            ##
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
            # Returns the truncated summary text for a blog post. 
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
            # This method performs an HTML-safe truncation, so any 
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
            # HTML elements defined in the text do not count against
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
            # the maximum character limit for the summary.
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
            #
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
            # The current maximum number of characters is 235.
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
            #
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
            # If the summary is less than the maximum number of characters,
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
            # then it is returned unchanged.  If the summary is nil, then
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
            # nil is returned.
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
            #
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
            # If the text is truncated, then an ellipsis is appended onto it.
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
            #
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
            # @param [ContentItem] blog_post The blog post to get
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
            #   the summary text from
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
            #
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
            # @return [String] The summary text from +blog_post+ 
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
            #   truncated to 235 characters.  
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
            def truncate_blog_summary(blog_post)
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          33
          
              return nil if blog_post.summary.nil?
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          32
          
              return truncate_html(blog_post.summary.html_safe, :length => 235)
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
            end
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
            ##
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
            # Returns the truncated title for a blog post.  It is a 
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
            # simple truncation to 68 characters, with an ellipsis
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
            # appended.
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
            #
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
            # If the title is less than or equal to 68 characters, then
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
            # it is returned unchanged.
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
            #
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
            # @param [ContentItem] blog_post The blog post to get the
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
            #   title from
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
            #
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
            # @return [String] The title from +blog_post+ truncated
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
            #   to 68 characters; returns nil if the title is nil
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
            def truncate_blog_title(blog_post)
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          24

            def filter_description(filter)

          module ProfileHelper

            CUSTOM_CLASSES = {
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
              email: "email-profile",
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
              twitter: "twitter-profile",

    8. 
          1
          
            DATA_TO_FOLD_INTO_ADDRESS = [:phone, :website]
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
            def contact_info_for profile
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          12
          
              data = fold_address_together(profile.profile_data)
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          36
          
              data.reject! { |k, v| v.empty? }
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          12
          
              data.inject("") do | list, (type, data) |
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          20
          
                list << "<li#{class_for(type)}>#{prep(data, type)}</li>"
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
              end
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
            end
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
          
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          1
          
            private
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
          
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
            def fold_address_together data
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          12
          
              address_parts = []
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          12
          
              address_parts.push(data[:address]) if data[:address]
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          12
          
              DATA_TO_FOLD_INTO_ADDRESS.each do |type|
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          24
          
                if data.has_key? type
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          10
          
                  address_parts.push("#{prep(data[type], type)}")
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          50
          
                  data.reject! { |(k,v)| k == type }
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                end
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              end
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          12
          
              address_parts.push("#{prep(data[:website], :website)}") if data[:website]
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          12
          
              data[:address] = address_parts.join('<br />');
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          12
          
              data

            def best_hit_description(hit, field_name)
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
              text = nil
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
              if highlight = hit.highlight(field_name)
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
                if(!highlight.nil?)
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
                  text = highlight.format { |fragment|  "___" + fragment + "~~~" }
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                end
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
              else
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                text = hit.result.method(field_name).call
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              end
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
          
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
              if(!text.nil?)
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                clean_text = Sanitize.clean(text).strip
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                text = text_containing_match clean_text
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              end
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
          
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              raw(text)
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
            end
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
          
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
            private
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
            def text_containing_match(text)
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          2
          
              matched_text_start = text.index(/(___)/) || 0
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          2
          
              matched_text_end = text.rindex(/(~~~)/) || 0
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              # Get only text surrounding the matched elements
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          2
          
              if(matched_text_start < 100)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          2
          
                slice_start = 0
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          2
          
                slice_end = matched_text_end + 150
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
              else
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                slice_start = matched_text_start - 50
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                slice_end = matched_text_end + 200
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              end
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          2
          
              text = text.slice!(slice_start..slice_end).strip
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              # truncate text so that it doesn't cut off the strong tags
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          2
          
              truncated = truncate(text, :length => 200)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          2
          
              highlighted = truncated.gsub(/(___)/, "<strong>").gsub(/~{2,}/, "</strong>").gsub(/~+/, "&nbsp;").gsub(/_{2,}/, "</strong>").gsub(/_+/, "&nbsp;")
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          2
          
              highlighted = auto_close_strong_tag(highlighted)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          2
          
              highlighted = append_ellipsis_if_missing(highlighted)
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          2
          
              return highlighted
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
            end
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
            def auto_close_strong_tag(text)
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
              # check if strong closing tag exists at the end of the string
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          4
          
              strong_start_index = text.rindex(/\<(strong)\>/) || 0
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          4
          
              strong_end_index =  text.rindex(/\<\/(strong)\>/) || 0
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          4
          
              if(strong_start_index > strong_end_index)
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                # need to append closing strong tag to string since it was detected that an opening strong tag exists
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          2
          
                text += "</strong>"
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          4
          
              return text
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
            end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
            def append_ellipsis_if_missing(text)
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          4
          
              ellipsis_index = text.rindex(/\.{3}/)
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          4
          
              if(ellipsis_index == nil)
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          3
          
                text += "..."
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          1
          
              elsif(ellipsis_index < (text.length - 3))
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                text += "..."
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
              end
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          4
          
              return text
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
            end
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          end

            def relative_weighted_votes_percentage(weighted_votes_percentage, highest_weighted_votes_percentage, offset=0)
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          9
          
              total = (weighted_votes_percentage.to_f / highest_weighted_votes_percentage.to_f)
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          9
          
              total = total.nan? ? 0 : total * 100
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
              
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          9
          
              total = total + offset if total > offset.abs
        
      7.

          9
          
              return total.to_i

            def back_to_surveyable(survey)

    11. 
          13
          
              if !survey.surveyable_type.blank? && !survey.surveyable_id.blank?

          12
          
                case survey.surveyable
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                when Issue
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          9

      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          9
          
                  title = survey.surveyable.name
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                when Conversation
        
      17. 
      
        
    17.

      22.

            def polymorphic_survey_response_url(survey_response)

          1
          
              surveyable_type = survey_response.try(:survey).try(:surveyable_type)

          1
          
              if surveyable_type
        
      27.

      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
            def initialize(user)
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              # CanCan is curently used only on the admin controller.
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          563
          
              if user.admin?
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          543
          
                can :manage,  :all
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          20
          
              elsif user.blog_admin?
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          18
          
                can :manage,  :admin_dashboard
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          18
          
                can :manage, ContentItem
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          18
          
                can :manage, :admin_blog_posts
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
              end
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
              
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
              # Define abilities for the passed in user here. For example:
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
              #
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
              #   user ||= User.new # guest user (not logged in)
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              #   if user.admin?
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              #     can :manage, :all
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              #   else
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
              #     can :read, :all
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
              #   end
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
              #
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              # The first argument to `can` is the action you are giving the user permission to do.
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
              # If you pass :manage it will apply to every action. Other common actions here are
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
              # :read, :create, :update and :destroy.
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
              #
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
              # The second argument is the resource the user can perform the action on. If you pass
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              # :all it will apply to every resource. Otherwise pass a Ruby class of the resource.
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              #
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
              # The third argument is an optional hash of conditions to further filter the objects.
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
              # For example, here the user can only update published articles.
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
              #
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
              #   can :update, Article, :published => true
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
              #
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
              # See the wiki for details: https://github.com/ryanb/cancan/wiki/Defining-Abilities
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
            end
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          end
        
      66.

            # Check if item is a valid type for Activity
        
      96.

          1
          
            def self.valid_type?(item)
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          564
          
              ok = false
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          564
          
              VALID_TYPES.each do |type|
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          2898
          
                if (item.is_a? Contribution and not item.top_level_contribution?)
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          80
          
                  ok = true
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          80
          
                  break
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                elsif item.is_a? type and not item.is_a? Contribution
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          379
          
                  ok = true
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          379
          
                  break
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                elsif item.is_a? GenericObject and item.__class__ == 'Contribution' and not item.top_level_contribution?
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                  ok = true
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                  break
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                elsif item.is_a? GenericObject and item.__class__ == type.to_s and not item.__class__ == 'Contribution'
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                  ok = true
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                  break
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                end
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
              end
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          564
          
              return ok
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
            end
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
          
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          1
          
            def self.encode(item)
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          205
          
              obj = nil
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          205
          
              if Activity.valid_type?(item)
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          205
          
                case item
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                when Conversation
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          68
          
                  obj = ActiveSupport::JSON.encode(item, include: [:person])
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                when Contribution
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          39
          
                  obj = ActiveSupport::JSON.encode(item, include: [:person, :conversation])
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                when RatingGroup
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                  # need to load rating descriptors
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          8
          
                  obj = ActiveSupport::JSON.encode(item, include: [:person, :ratings, :conversation, :contribution])
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                when SurveyResponse
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          11
          
                  obj = ActiveSupport::JSON.encode(item, include: {person:{}, survey: {methods: :type}}) #included the STI type on surveys
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                when Petition
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          10
          
                  obj = ActiveSupport::JSON.encode(item, include: [:person, :conversation])
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                when PetitionSignature
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          14
          
                  obj = ActiveSupport::JSON.encode(item, include: [:person, :petition])
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                when Reflection
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          10
          
                  obj = ActiveSupport::JSON.encode(item, include: [:person, :conversation])
        
      135. 
      
        
    135.

            def self.decode(item)
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          9
          
              hash = ActiveSupport::JSON.decode(item)
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          9
          
              return self.to_active_record(hash.keys.first, hash.values.first)
        
      147.

      148.

    152. 
          
          
            # Retrieves the most recent activity items
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
            #
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
            # If any of the items do not exist, they will not be returned. Hence
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
            # it is possible to get less than the requested amount of activity
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
            # items.
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          1
          
            def self.most_recent_activity_items(options = {})
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          213
          
              options.reverse_merge!(limit: nil, offset:nil, order:'DESC', exclude_conversation: false, exclude_rating: true)
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          213
          
              options[:order] = 'DESC' if options[:order].nil?
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
          
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          213
          
              activities = nil
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          213
          
              activities = Activity.where(conversation_id: options[:conversation])  if options[:conversation].present?
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          213
          
              activities = Activity.where(      person_id: options[:person])        if options[:person].present?
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
          
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          213
          
              if activities.nil?
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          193
          
                activities = Activity.where('item_type != "Conversation"')          if options[:exclude_conversation]
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
              else
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          20
          
                activities = activities.where('item_type != "Conversation"')        if options[:exclude_conversation]
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
              end
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
          
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          213
          
              if activities.nil?
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          193
          
                activities = Activity.where('item_type != "RatingGroup"')           if options[:exclude_rating]
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
              else
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          20
          
                activities = activities.where('item_type != "RatingGroup"')         if options[:exclude_rating]
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
              end
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
          
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          213
          
              if activities.nil?
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          1
          
                activities = Activity.order("item_created_at #{options[:order]}")
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
              else
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          212
          
                activities = activities.order("item_created_at #{options[:order]}")
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
              end
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
          
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          213
          
              activities = activities.offset(options[:offset])                      if options[:offset]
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          213
          
              activities = activities.limit(options[:limit])                        if options[:limit]
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
          
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          243
          
              activities.collect{|a| a.item}.compact
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
            end
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
          
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          1
          
            def self.items
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
              this.collect do |a|
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
                a.item
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
              end.compact
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
            end
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
          
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          1
          
            private
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
          
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
            ############################################################
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
            # encode/decode helpers
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
          
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          1
          
            def self.to_active_record(clazz, data)
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          26
          
              clazz = clazz.classify.constantize
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          26
          
              data.each do |key, value|
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          439
          
                if value.is_a? Hash
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          17
          
                  data[key] = self.to_active_record(key, value)
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
                elsif value.is_a? Array
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          1
          
                  value.each_with_index do |data, index|
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
                    value[index] = self.to_active_record(key, data) if value[index].is_a? Hash
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
                  end
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
                end
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
              end
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          26
          
              data['__class__'] = clazz.to_s
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          26
          
              obj = GenericObject.new(data)
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          26
          
              return obj
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
            end
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
          
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
          end
        
      217.

            def url

            def add_person(role, person)
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          25
          
              case role
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
              when 'guest'
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          11
          
                self.content_items_people << ContentItemsPerson.create(role: 'Guest', person: person, content_item: self)
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          11

      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
              when 'host'
        
      140. 
      
        
    140.

      141.

          12
          
                return true
        
      142. 
      
        
    142.

            def self.valid_attributes?(attributes)

              mock = self.new(attributes)

              unless mock.valid?

          1
          
            def newest_rating_for_contribution_branch
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          
          
              # First get the Rating Group that is associated with each Contribution
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          
          
              #   Contribution_id => [Rating Group(s)]
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          1
          
              rgs       = RatingGroup.scoped
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          1
          
              rgs       = rgs.where(:conversation_id => conversation).includes(:ratings)
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          1
          
              contribution_ids = self.self_and_descendants.collect(&:id).uniq
        
      316. 
      
        
    316. 
          1
          
              rgs       = rgs.where("contribution_id in (?)", contribution_ids )
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          
          
          
        
      318. 
      
        
    318. 
          1
          
              newest = rgs.max_by(&:updated_at)
        
      319. 
      
        
    319. 
          
          
          
        
      320. 
      
        
    320. 
          1
          
              newest.respond_to?(:updated_at) ? newest.updated_at : nil
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          
          
            end

            def move_to_position(new_position)
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          5
          
              if new_position.is_a?(Integer)
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          5
          
                conversations = Conversation.sort_position_asc.select([:id,:position]).where(['id != ?', self.id]).all
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          5
          
                self.transaction do
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          5
          
                  conversations.each_with_index do |conversation, index|
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          16
          
                    if index >= new_position
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          10
          
                      new_index = index + 1
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                    else
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          6
          
                      new_index = index
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                    end
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          16
          
                    Conversation.where(:id=>conversation.id).update_all(:position => (new_index))
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                  end
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          5
          
                  Conversation.where(:id=>self.id).update_all(:position => new_position)
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                end
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
              end
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
            end

      140.

          14
          
              actions = Action.all
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          18

          14

          18

          1
          
            def community_user_ids
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
              rater_ids = RatingGroup.select(:person_id).where(contribution_id: contribution_ids).uniq.collect do |rating_group|
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                rating_group.person_id
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
              end
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
              person_ids = Array.new
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
              person_ids += [owner]
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
              person_ids += contributor_ids
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
              person_ids += rater_ids
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
              person_ids = person_ids.flatten.uniq.reject(&:blank?)
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
              people = Person.select(:id).where(:id => person_ids).where('confirmed_at IS NOT NULL and locked_at IS NULL')
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
              people.collect{ |person| person.id }
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
            end

          1
          
            def participants
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          169

      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          169
          
              persons = [self.person]
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          169

      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          169

            def self.available_filters

            # Display Conversations by Most Active
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          1
          
            def self.most_active(options = {})
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          181
          
              options.reverse_merge!(filter:0)
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          181
          
              daysago = options.delete(:daysago)
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
          
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          181
          
              filter = options[:filter]
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          181
          
              filter = [filter] unless options[:filter].respond_to?(:flatten) || filter.nil?
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          181
          
              filter.flatten!
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
          
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          181
          
              results = Conversation.select('conversations.*, COUNT(*) AS count_all, MAX(contributions.created_at) AS max_contributions_created_at').
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
                               joins('LEFT OUTER JOIN contributions ON conversations.id = contributions.conversation_id').
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
                               where("conversations.id not in (?)", filter).
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
                               group('conversations.id').
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          
          
                               order('count_all DESC, max_contributions_created_at DESC')
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          
          
          
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          181
          
              results = results.where("contributions.created_at > ?", Time.now - daysago.days) if daysago
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          181
          
              return results
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
            end
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
          
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
            # From the top active conversations, select a random sample.
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
            #
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          
          
            # limit = number of most active conversations to select from (default 4)
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
            # select = number of random conversations to select (default 2)
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          1
          
            def self.random_active(select=2, limit=4, filter = [])
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          1
          
              filter = [filter] unless filter.respond_to?(:flatten)
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          1
          
              filter.flatten!
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
          
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          1
          
              limit = select if select > limit
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
          
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          1
          
              actives = Conversation.most_active - filter
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          1
          
              actives = actives[0,limit]
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          1
          
              actives.sample(select)
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          
          
            end
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          
          
          
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          1
          
            def self.random_recommended(select=1, filter = [])
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          1
          
              filter = [filter] unless filter.respond_to?(:flatten)
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          1
          
              filter.flatten!
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          
          
          
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          1
          
              r = Conversation.recommended
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          1
          
              r = r - filter
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          1
          
              r.sample(select)
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          
          
            end
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          
          
          
        
      273.

            def set_pub_date

    53. 
          45
          
              self.pub_date = DateTime.now if self.pub_date.blank?

          45

    57. 
          1
          
            def structify(item)
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          14
          
              item = ActiveSupport::JSON.decode(item) unless item.is_a? Hash
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          14
          
              struct = OpenStruct.new(item)
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          14
          
              item.each do |key, value|
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          63
          
                if value.is_a? Hash
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          7
          
                  obj = structify(value)
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          7
          
                  struct.send("#{key}=".to_sym, obj)
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                elsif value.is_a? Array
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          3
          
                  value = struct.send(key.to_sym)
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          3
          
                  (0 .. value.size-1).each do |i|
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          6
          
                    value[i] = structify(value[i]) if value[i].is_a? Hash
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                  end
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                end
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
              end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          14
          
              return struct
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
            end
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
          end

            def self.sample_and_filtered(limit=10, filter = [])
        
      11.
