            def self.top_metro_regions(limit = 5)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          51
          
              sql = <<-SQL
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                SELECT m.*, count(m.id) as count_mid from metro_regions m join conversations c on c.`metro_region_id` = m.id
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                GROUP BY m.metrocode
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                ORDER BY count_mid DESC
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                LIMIT #{limit}
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
              SQL
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          51
          
              MetroRegion.find_by_sql(sql)
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
            end

            def self.search_city_province(q)
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
              q = q.to_s.gsub(/,|\./i,'') #remove comma
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
              q = q.gsub(/\s/i, '-') # sub whitespace into '-' because the tokens are using '-'
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
              MetroRegion.where("city_province_token LIKE '#{q}%'").order('city_province_token ASC').limit(50)
        
      75.

          1
          
            validates :item_created_at, presence: true
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
            validates :person_id, presence: true
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
            validates :receiver_id, presence: true
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
            VALID_TYPES = [ Conversation, Contribution, Issue, RatingGroup, SurveyResponse,
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                            Petition, PetitionSignature, Reflection, ReflectionComment, Survey]
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
            delegate :name, :to => :person, :prefix => true
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
          
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
            # Items title
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
            # * Whitespace trimmed from the left and right
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
            def item_title
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              item.title.strip
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
            end
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
            def item_content
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              Sanitize.clean(item.content, :remove_contents => ['script', 'style']).strip
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
            end
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
            # Accept an Active Record object of valid type
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
            def initialize(attributes = nil)
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          178
          
              if Notification.valid_type?(attributes)
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          168
          
                attributes = attributes.becomes(Contribution) if attributes.is_a?(Contribution)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          168
          
                attr = {
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                  item_id: attributes.id,
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                  item_type: attributes.class.to_s,
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                  item_created_at: attributes.created_at,
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                  person_id: attributes.person.id
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                }
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          168
          
                if attributes.respond_to?(:conversation_id) && !attributes.conversation_id.nil?
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          146
          
                  attr[:conversation_id] = attributes.conversation_id
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                elsif attributes.respond_to?(:issue_id) && !attributes.issue_id.nil?
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                  attr[:issue_id] = attributes.issue_id
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                elsif attributes.is_a?(Conversation)
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                  attr[:conversation_id] = attributes.id
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                elsif attributes.is_a?(Vote)
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                  attr[:conversation_id] = attributes.surveyable_id if attributes.surveyable_type == 'Conversation'
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                end
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          168
          
                attributes = attr
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              elsif attributes.is_a?(ActiveRecord::Base)
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                # if it's not a valid Notification type, and it's an activerecord object, then nullify it, because it breaks in rails >= 3.1 (Perry)
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          4
          
                attributes = nil
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
              end
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          178
          
              super(attributes)
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
            end
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
          
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1

      60.

      61.

            def self.create_for(item)
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          108
          
              case item
        
      90.

              when Contribution
        
      91.

          23
          
                self.contributed_on_followed_conversation_notification(item)
        
      94. 
      
        
    94.

      95.

                self.rated_on_contribution_notification(item)

      98.

          5
          
                self.reflected_on_followed_conversation_notification(item)
        
      99.

      100.

                self.voted_on_followed_conversation_notification(item)

            def self.destroy_notification(item, person_id, receiver_id)
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          51
          
              receiver_id.delete(person_id) if receiver_id.is_a?(Array)
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          51
          
              if person_id != receiver_id
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          50
          
                Notification.destroy_all(:item_id => item.id, :item_type => item.class.name, :person_id => person_id, :receiver_id =>  receiver_id)
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
              end
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
            end

            def self.viewed(person)
        
      340. 
      
        
    340.

            # Retrieve list of Old Notifications
        
      345. 
      
        
    345. 
          
          
            #
        
      346. 
      
        
    346. 
          
          
            # Purpose:
        
      347. 
      
        
    347. 
          
          
            # * We'll want to clean up Old Notifications.
        
      348. 
      
        
    348. 
          
          
            # * This will probably be a two step process.
        
      349. 
      
        
    349. 
          
          
            # ** Old viewed Notifications
        
      350. 
      
        
    350. 
          
          
            # ** Older unviewed Notifications.
        
      351. 
      
        
    351. 
          
          
            #
        
      352. 
      
        
    352. 
          
          
            # Options:
        
      353. 
      
        
    353. 
          
          
            # * before: Find Notifications older than before date
        
      354. 
      
        
    354. 
          
          
            # * viewed: Find Notifications that have been viewed (default:false)
        
      355. 
      
        
    355. 
          1
          
            def self.old_notifications(options = {})
        
      356. 
      
        
    356. 
          
          
              options.reverse_merge!({before:14.days.ago, viewed:false})
        
      357. 
      
        
    357. 
          
          
              notifications = Notification.where("created_at < ?", options[:before])
        
      358. 
      
        
    358. 
          
          
              notifications = notifications.where("viewed_at is null") unless options[:viewed]
        
      359. 
      
        
    359. 
          
          
              notifications
        
      360. 
      
        
    360. 
          
          
            end
        
      361. 
      
        
    361. 
          
          
          
        
      362. 
      
        
    362. 
          
          
            # List of Users That Have Notifications
        
      363. 
      
        
    363. 
          1
          
            def self.users_with_notifications
        
      364. 
      
        
    364. 
          7
          
              Notification.group("person_id").collect{|n| n.person_id}
        
      365. 
      
        
    365. 
          
          
            end
        
      366. 
      
        
    366. 
          
          
          
        
      367. 
      
        
    367. 
          
          
            # Purge notifications over limit for each user
        
      368. 
      
        
    368. 
          1
          
            def self.limit_notifications_per_user(options = {})
        
      369. 
      
        
    369. 
          1
          
              options.reverse_merge!({limit:50, log:false})
        
      370. 
      
        
    370. 
          1
          
              puts "* limit_notifications set to #{options[:limit]} notifications" if options[:log]
        
      371. 
      
        
    371. 
          
          
          
        
      372. 
      
        
    372. 
          1
          
              users = Notification.users_with_notifications
        
      373. 
      
        
    373. 
          1
          
              users.each do |user|
        
      374. 
      
        
    374. 
          1
          
                user_notifications = Notification.where('receiver_id = ?', user).order("created_at desc")
        
      375. 
      
        
    375. 
          
          
          
        
      376. 
      
        
    376. 
          1
          
                if user_notifications.count > options[:limit]
        
      377. 
      
        
    377. 
          1
          
                  puts "* limit_notifications: #{Person.find(user).name} has #{user_notifications.count} notifications" if options[:log]
        
      378. 
      
        
    378. 
          1
          
                  newest_notifications = user_notifications.limit(options[:limit]).all
        
      379. 
      
        
    379. 
          1
          
                  Notification.where('receiver_id = ?', user).destroy_all(['id NOT IN (?)', newest_notifications.collect(&:id)])
        
      380. 
      
        
    380. 
          
          
                end
        
      381. 
      
        
    381. 
          
          
              end
        
      382. 
      
        
    382. 
          
          
            end
        
      383. 
      
        
    383. 
          
          
          
        
      384. 
      
        
    384. 
          
          
          end

            # Ensure the salt is a valid bcrypt salt since the salt can be assigned

            # via People Aggregator API updates.
        
      7. 
      
        
    7.

    8. 
          
          
            # password encryption algorithm

            #
        
      10.

            def validate(record)

            def name=(value)

          107

          107

            def short_name
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          1
          
              self.first_name.blank? ? self.name : self.first_name
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
            end
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
          
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
            # A valid zip code is composed of:
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
            # * base, and
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
            # * optionally the extension
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
            #
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
            # Typical Format: 12345-1234
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          1
          
            def base_zip_code
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          2990
          
              zip_code.respond_to?(:to_s) ? zip_code.to_s.gsub(/\-.*/, '') : ''
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
            end
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          
          
          
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
            # Short zip code is the base zip code unless it is too short or long, then it is blank
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          1
          
            def short_zip_code
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          2986
          
              short_zip = base_zip_code
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          2986
          
              if short_zip.size < 4 or short_zip.size > 5
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          4
          
                ''
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
              else
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          2982
          
                short_zip
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
              end
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          
          
            end
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
          
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          1
          
            def most_recent_activity
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          10
          
              Activity.most_recent_activity_items(person:self)
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          
          
            end
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          
          
          
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          1
          
            def self.find_all_by_name(name)
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          3
          
              first, last = parse_name(name)
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          3
          
              where(:first_name => first, :last_name => last)
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          
          
            end
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          
          
          
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          1
          
            def self.find_confirmed_order_by_recency(person_ids=nil)
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          13
          
              person = Person.order('confirmed_at DESC').where('confirmed_at IS NOT NULL').where('locked_at IS NULL')
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          13
          
              if not person_ids.nil?
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          3
          
                person = person.where('confirmed_at IS NOT NULL')
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          3
          
                person = person.where('locked_at IS NULL')
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          3
          
                person = person.where({ 'people.id' => person_ids})
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          
          
              end
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          13
          
              return person
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          
          
            end
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          
          
          
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          1
          
            def self.find_confirmed_order_by_most_active(person_ids=nil)
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          27
          
              person = Person.select("people.*, count(ti.person_id)").
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          
          
                joins('left outer join top_items ti on people.id = ti.person_id').
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          
          
                group('people.id').
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          
          
                order('count(ti.person_id) DESC').
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          
          
                where('confirmed_at IS NOT NULL AND locked_at IS NULL')
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          27
          
              if not person_ids.nil?
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          25
          
                person = person.where("confirmed_at IS NOT NULL AND locked_at IS NULL")
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          25
          
                person = person.where({ 'people.id' => person_ids})
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          
          
              end
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          27
          
              return person
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          
          
            end
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          
          
          
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          1
          
            def self.find_confirmed_order_by_last_name(letter = nil, person_ids=nil)
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          17
          
              person = Person
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          17
          
              if not person_ids.nil?
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          3
          
                person = person.where({ 'people.id' => person_ids})
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          
          
              end
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          
          
          
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          17
          
              if letter.nil?
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          9
          
                person = person.order('blank_last_name, last_name, first_name ASC').
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          
          
                  where('confirmed_at IS NOT NULL and locked_at IS NULL').
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          
          
                  select("*, IF(last_name IS NULL OR last_name='' OR UCASE(SUBSTR(last_name, 1) NOT BETWEEN 'A' AND 'Z'), 1, 0) as blank_last_name")
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          
          
              else
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          8
          
                person = person.order('last_name, first_name ASC').
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          
          
                  where('confirmed_at IS NOT NULL').
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          
          
                  where("last_name like '#{letter}%'").
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          
          
                  where('locked_at IS NULL')
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          
          
              end
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          17
          
              return person
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          
          
            end
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          
          
          
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          
          
            # Takes a full name and return an array of first and last name
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          
          
            # Examples
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          
          
            #  "Wendy" => ["Wendy", ""]
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          
          
            #  "Wendy Smith" => ["Wendy", "Smith"]
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          
          
            #  "Wendy van Buren" => ["Wendy", "van Buren"]
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          
          
            #
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          1
          
            def self.parse_name(name)
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          115
          
              first, *last = name.split(' ')
        
      316. 
      
        
    316. 
          115
          
              last = last.try(:join, " ") || ""
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          115
          
              return first, last
        
      318. 
      
        
    318. 
          
          
            end
        
      319. 
      
        
    319. 
          
          
          
        
      320. 
      
        
    320. 
          1
          
            def create_proxy
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          
          
              self.email = (first_name + last_name).gsub(/['\s]/,'').downcase + "@example.com"
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          
          
              self.password = 'p4s$w0Rd'
        
      323. 
      
        
    323. 
          
          
              self.proxy = true
        
      324. 
      
        
    324.

            def petition_name

            def self.ratings_for_conversation_by_contribution_with_count(conversation, person=nil)

          13
          
              person = person.is_a?(Person) ? person.id : person

            def one_line_summary

            # End of Day for Eastern Time in UTC format
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
            #
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
            # This is actually the end_date + 1 day since the date time will reflect when things are officially over.
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
            # ex. If we want to end on July 31st, July 31st 11:59:59 is still not the end.  August 1st 00:00:00 is.
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
            #
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
            # This is for the Eastern Time zone since our users are EST.  Then it's converted to UTC for server use.
        
      89.

          1
          
            def real_end_date_time

          357

            def expired?

            def self.find_all_url_summary_for_week(week_of = 0)
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          7
          
              from_date, to_date = process_from_and_to_date(week_of)
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          7
          
              sql = <<-SQL 
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                SELECT *, COUNT(id) AS page_views FROM 
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                (SELECT * FROM widget_logs 
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                WHERE created_at BETWEEN '#{from_date}' AND '#{to_date}'
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                ORDER BY created_at DESC) AS t

            def self.find_one_url_summary_for_week(url, week_of = 0)
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          5
          
              url = add_first_slash_if_doesnt_exist(url)
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          5
          
              from_date, to_date = process_from_and_to_date(week_of)
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          5
          
              sql = <<-SQL 
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                SELECT *, COUNT(id) AS page_views FROM 
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                (SELECT * FROM widget_logs 
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                  WHERE url = '#{url}'
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                  AND created_at BETWEEN '#{from_date}' AND '#{to_date}'
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                  ORDER BY created_at DESC
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                ) AS t
        
      27. 
      
        
    27.

      28.

      29. 
      
        
    29.

      30.

            end
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
            
        
      33.

          1
          
            def self.process_from_and_to_date(week_of=0)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          14
          
              from_date = week_of.to_i.weeks.ago.beginning_of_week.utc.to_s(:db)
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          14
          
              to_date = week_of.to_i.weeks.ago.end_of_week.utc.to_s(:db)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          14
          
              return from_date, to_date
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
            end
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
            def self.add_first_slash_if_doesnt_exist(url)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          7
          
              url.gsub!(/^/,'/') if url.match(/^[^\/]/)
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          7
          
              return url
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
            end

    42. 
          
          
          end

            def after_create(model)

            def after_save(model)
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          136
          
              if model.is_a?(Contribution)
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                if model.confirmed &&
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                  (
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                    (!model.conversation.nil? && model != model.conversation.contributions.first) ||
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                    (!model.issue.nil? && model != model.issue.contributions.first)
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          26
          
                  )
        
      20. 
      
        
    20.

            protected
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
            # Very primitive way of validating speakers
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
            # Adds errors if
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
            #  o can't identify a Person for the speaker
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
            #  o more than 1 Person matches a speaker
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
            #
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
            def validate_speakers(dialogs)
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
              missing_speakers = []
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
              duplicate_speakers = []
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
              dialogs.map(&:speaker).uniq.select do |name|
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                people = Person.find_all_by_name(name)
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                if people.empty?
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                  missing_speakers << name
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                elsif people.size > 1
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  duplicate_speakers << name
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                end
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
              if missing_speakers.any? || duplicate_speakers.any?
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                missing_speakers.each do |name|
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                  @errors.add_to_base("Could not find a person with name #{name}")
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                end
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                duplicate_speakers.each do |name|
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                  @errors.add_to_base("More than one Person matched name #{name}")
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                end
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                raise ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid.new(self)
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
              end
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
            end
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
          
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
          end

    7. 
          1
          
            def self.avatar_image_url(person, options={})
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          172
          
              request = options.delete(:request)
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          172
          
              if request.present?
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                base_url = "#{request.protocol}#{request.host_with_port}"
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              else
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          172
          
                base_url = nil
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
              end
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
              # Image displayed by order of priority
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              # 1. image uploaded
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          172
          
              return person.avatar.url(:standard) if person.avatar?
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              # 2. facebook
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          171
          
              return self.facebook_image_url(person) if person.authentications.present?
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              # 3. twitter
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          154
          
              return self.twitter_image_url(person) if person.twitter_username.present?
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              # 4. gravatar
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          146
          
              return self.gravatar_image_url(person) if self.gravatar_available?(person)
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              # 5. default - need to be absolute path, due to widget
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          144
          
              "#{base_url}#{person.avatar.url(:standard)}"
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
            end
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
            def self.facebook_image_url(person)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          17
          
              facebook_id = person.authentications.first.uid
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          17
          
              "https://graph.facebook.com/#{facebook_id}/picture"
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
            end
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
            def self.twitter_image_url(person)
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          8
          
              "http://api.twitter.com/1/users/profile_image/#{person.twitter_username}"
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
            end
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
            def self.gravatar_available?(person)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          142
          
              gravatar_response = Net::HTTP.get_response(URI.parse(gravatar_image_url(person)))
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          142
          
              unless gravatar_response.class == Net::HTTPNotFound
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                true
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
              else
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          142
          
                false
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
              end
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
            end
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
            def self.gravatar_image_url(person)
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          144
          
              hashed_email = self.create_email_hash(person)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          144
          
              "http://gravatar.com/avatar/#{hashed_email}?d=404"
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
            end
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
          
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          1
          
            def self.create_email_hash(person)
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          142
          
              Digest::MD5.hexdigest(person.email)
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
            end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
            # Update an entities avatar url
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          1
          
            def self.update_avatar_url_for(person)
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          153
          
              avatar_image = avatar_image_url(person)
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          153
          
              Person.update_all({avatar_url: avatar_image, avatar_cached_image_url: avatar_image}, {id: person.id})
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
            end
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
          
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
          end

            def process_daily_digest(set = nil)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              # get the set of people receiving the digest email
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          8
          
              set = self.generate_digest_set if set.nil?
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
              # for each person
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          8
          
              set.each do |person, conversations|
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          7
          
                unless set[person].empty?
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                  # send the email
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          6
          
                  Notifier.daily_digest(person, conversations).deliver
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                end
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              end
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
          
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
            end
        
      48.

            def get_digest_recipients
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          22
          
              @digest_recipients = Person.where(:daily_digest => true)
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
            end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          
        
      53.

          1
          
            def time_range
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
              # set the time range for yesterday
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          154
          
              (Time.now.midnight - 1.day)..(Time.now.midnight - 1.second)
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
            end
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
          
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1
          
            def get_updated_contributions
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
              # get the list of conversations that were updated yesterday
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          22
          
              @updated_contributions = Contribution.confirmed.includes(:conversation).order('conversation_id ASC, id ASC').where(created_at: time_range).where(top_level_contribution: false)
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
            end
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
          
        
      63.

          1
          
            def get_updated_conversations
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
              # extract the individual conversation ids
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
              # Get conversations from updated contributions
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          30
          
              @updated_conversations = @updated_contributions.map { |c| c.conversation }
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
              # Get conversations from updated reflections
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          26
          
              @updated_conversations += @updated_reflections.map { |c| c.conversation }
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
          
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
              # Get conversations from votes created
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          37
          
              @updated_conversations += @votes_created_activities.map { |c| c.surveyable }
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
              # Get conversations from votes ended
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          37
          
              @updated_conversations += @votes_ended_activities.map { |c| c.surveyable }
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
              # Get conversations from votes responses
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          37
          
              @updated_conversations += @vote_response_activities.map { |c| c.survey.surveyable }
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
          
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
              ##### PETITION RELATED ACTIVITY #####
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
              # Get Conversations from Petitions Created
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          26
          
              @updated_conversations += @new_petitions.map {|p| p.conversation } if @new_petitions
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
              # Get Conversations from Petition Signatures
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          26
          
              @updated_conversations += @petition_signatures_activity.map {|sig| sig.petition_conversation } if @petition_signatures_activity
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
          
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          22
          
              @updated_conversations.uniq!
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
            end
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
          
        
      87.

            def get_updated_reflections

    88. 
          22
          
              @updated_reflections = Reflection.includes(:conversation).order('conversation_id ASC, id ASC').where(created_at: time_range)

            end
        
      90.

            def get_recipient_subscriptions
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
              # get the subscriptions for each person
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          22
          
              @digest_recipients.each do |person|
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
          
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          21
          
                subscriptions = person.subscriptions
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
          
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          21
          
                digest = []
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
          
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          21
          
                subscriptions.each do |sub|
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
          
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                  # is the subscription in the list of current conversations?
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          31
          
                  if @updated_conversations.include? sub.subscribable
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          20
          
                    digest << [sub.subscribable]
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                  end
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                end
        
      106.

          22

          22

          22

          1
          
            def get_petition_signatures_activity
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          22
          
              @petition_signatures_activity = PetitionSignature.where(created_at: time_range).order('created_at ASC')
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          26
          
              @grouped_petition_signatures_activity = @petition_signatures_activity.group_by(&:petition_id).map{|k,v| [k,v]}

            # Gather All Activity by Conversation
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          1
          
            def group_activities_by_conversation
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          22
          
              @digest_set.each do |person, conversations_array|
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
          
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          21
          
                conversations_array.each do |conversation|
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
          
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          20
          
                  contributions = @updated_contributions.select do |contribution|
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          8
          
                    contribution.conversation == conversation.first
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
                  end
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
          
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          20
          
                  reflections = @updated_reflections.select do |reflection|
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          4
          
                    reflection.conversation == conversation.first
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
                  end
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
          
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          20
          
                  votes_created = @votes_created_activities.select do |vote|
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          15
          
                    vote.surveyable == conversation.first
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
                  end
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
          
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          20
          
                  votes_ended = @votes_ended_activities.select do |vote|
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          15
          
                    vote.surveyable == conversation.first
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
                  end
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
          
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          20
          
                  vote_responses = @vote_response_activities.select do |vote_response|
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          15
          
                    vote_response.survey.surveyable == conversation.first
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
                  end
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
          
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          20
          
                  petitions_created = @new_petitions.select do |petition|
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          4
          
                    petition.conversation == conversation.first
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
                  end
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
          
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          20
          
                  grouped_petition_signatures = @grouped_petition_signatures_activity.select do |petition_signature|
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          4
          
                    petition_signature[1][0].petition_conversation == conversation.first
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
                  end
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
                  
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          20
          
                  items = (contributions + reflections + votes_created + votes_ended + vote_responses + petitions_created + grouped_petition_signatures)
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
          
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          20
          
                  conversation << items
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
                end
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
              end
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          22
          
              return @digest_set
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
          
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
            end
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
          
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
          
        
      202.

            def fetch(url, opts = {})
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          41
          
              clear_state
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          41

          41

      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          41
          
              opts[:wmode] = 'opaque'
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          41

      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          39
          
              @properties = objs[0].marshal_dump
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          38

      31. 
      
        
    31.

      32.

            def self.parse_raw(data)

      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          395
          
              if not data.is_a?(Hash)

          105

          105

      122.

          80

            def self.to_embed_or_fancybox(code, max_embed_width = nil)
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
          
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          4
          
              html = nil
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          4
          
              code = self.parse_raw(code) 
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
          
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
              # link type always generates linked thumbnail
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          4
          
              if code[:type] == 'link' or code[:oembed][:type] == 'link'
        
      165. 
      
        
    165.

      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
          
        
      167. 
      
        
    167.

          1

          1

      171.

          1

          1

      173.

          1

    174.

      175. 
      
        
    175.

      176. 
      
        
    176.

      179.

            def self.to_linked_thumbnail(code, maxwidth = nil)

            def self.to_thumbnail(code, maxwidth = nil)
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
          
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          11
          
              html = nil
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          11
          
              img = nil
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          11
          
              code = self.parse_raw(code)
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
          
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          11
          
              if not code[:oembed].empty? and code[:oembed].has_key?(:thumbnail_url)
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          8
          
                img = {
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
                  :url => code[:oembed][:thumbnail_url],
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
                  :height => code[:oembed][:thumbnail_height],
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
                  :width => code[:oembed][:thumbnail_width],
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
                }
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
              elsif !code[:images].empty?
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
                small = nil
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
          
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
                if maxwidth.nil?
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
                  code[:images].each do |image|
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
                    if img.nil? or (image[:width].to_i > img[:width].to_i)
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
                      img = image
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
                    end
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
                  end
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
                else
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
                  code[:images].each do |image|
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
                    if image[:width].to_i < maxwidth && (img.nil? || image[:width].to_i > img[:width].to_i)
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          
          
                      img = image
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          
          
                    end
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
                    if small.nil? or (image[:width].to_i < small[:width].to_i)
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          
          
                      small = image
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
                    end
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
                  end
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
                  img = small if img.nil?
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
                end
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          
          
              end 
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
          
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          11
          
              if not img.nil?
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          8
          
                if not maxwidth.nil? and img[:width].to_i > maxwidth
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          1
          
                  img[:height] = img[:height].to_i * maxwidth / img[:width].to_i
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          1
          
                  img[:width] = maxwidth
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
                end
        
      258. 
      
        
    258.

            def self.generate_img_html(opts)

            def self.generate_link_html(url, title, link_body = nil)

          1

      363.

            ISSUE_SQL = <<-sql
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              select
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                i.id as 'issue_id',
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                i.name as 'issue_name',
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                c.id as 'conversation_id'
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
              from
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                issues i
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
              inner join
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                conversations_issues ci
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
              on
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                ci.issue_id = i.id
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              inner join
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                conversations c
        
      22. 
      
        
    22.

      23.

                ci.conversation_id = c.id

    24.

      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                i.id asc
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              ;
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
            sql
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
          
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
            CONVERSATION_SQL = <<-sql
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              select
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                c.id as 'conversation',
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                count(t.id) as 'contributions',
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                count(distinct(t.owner)) as 'participants'
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
              from
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                contributions t
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
              inner join
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                conversations c
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
              on
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                t.conversation_id = c.id
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
              where
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                t.confirmed = 1
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
              group by
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                c.id
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
              ;
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
            sql
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
          
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
            def conversations_by_issue(issue_id)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          2

          2

            def contributions_by_issue(issue_id)

            def load_issue_data

      78.

              @issues = {}

      80.

      81.

      82.

      83.

      86. 
      
        
    86.

      87. 
      
        
    87.

      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                end
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
              end
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
          
        
      91.

              @conversations = {}

      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                unless @conversations.has_key? [c[0]]
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                  @conversations[c[0]] = {
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                    conversation_id: c[0],
        
      96. 
      
        
    96.

      97.

      98.

            def render

              # Civic Commons logo

            def signer_text_table(signature)

    91.

    93.

    95.

      98. 
      
        
    98.

      99. 
      
        
    99.

            def signature_data(signature)
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
              [
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                {
        
      104. 
      
        
    104.

      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                  scale: 0.4
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                },
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                signer_text_table(signature)
        
      108. 
      
        
    108.

      109. 
      
        
    109.

      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
          
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          1
          
            def signature_table
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
              data = []
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
              row = []
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
              petition.signatures.each_with_index do |signature, index|
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                if index % self.number_of_columns == 0
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                  row = []
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                end
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
          
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                values = signature_data(signature)
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                for value in values
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                  row.push(value)
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                end
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
          
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                if (index % self.number_of_columns == self.number_of_columns - 1) or
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                  (petition.signatures.length == index + 1)
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                  data.push(row)
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                end
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
              end
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
          
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
              pdf.make_table(data) do
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                cells.borders = []
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                columns((0..(data.first.length * 2)).step(2)).padding = 0
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                columns((0..(data.first.length * 2)).step(2)).width = 40
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
              end
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
            end
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
          end
        
      137.

            def fetch_filtered_results(query = nil, filter = nil, options = {})

            def accepted_fields(models)
        
      72.

          9

          9

          9

      78. 
      
        
    78.

      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          1

      80. 
      
        
    80.

      81. 
      
        
    81.

      82. 
      
        
    82.

      83. 
      
        
    83.

      84. 
      
        
    84.

      85. 
      
        
    85.

    86.

      87. 
      
        
    87.

      88. 
      
        
    88.

      89. 
      
        
    89.

      90.

      91.

    26.

                  record.voted = true if selected_option_id.include?(record.survey_option_id)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                end
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              end
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
            end
        
      30.

          1
          
            def render_chart
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
              chart = GChart.bar do |g|
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
                  g.title = 'Vote Results'
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1

      35.

                  g.colors = DEFAULT_CHART_COLORS
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          7
          
                  g.legend = progress_result.collect{|record| record.title}
        
      37.

                  g.height = (progress_result.count * 40) + 60

          1
          
                  g.thickness = 20

      44.

          1
          
                  g.extras = {'chdlp'=>'tv',            # Positioning of legend
        
      45.

                              'chma' => '20,20,20,20',  # Margin

      48.

      52.
