            # {/ccml:rss}
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
            def index
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          12
          
              rss = parse_rss
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          12
          
              return nil if rss.nil?
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          7
          
              items = []
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          7
          
              limit = [rss.items.size, @opts[:limit].to_i].min
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          7
          
              limit = rss.items.size if limit == 0
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
          
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          7
          
              channel = parse_channel(rss, 'channel_')
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
          
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          7
          
              (0..limit-1).each do |i|
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          88
          
                data = {}
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          88
          
                channel['channel_item_count'] = limit
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          88
          
                data.merge!(channel)
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          88
          
                data.merge!(parse_item(rss.items[i], 'item_'))
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          88
          
                items << data
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              end
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
          
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          7
          
              return process_tag_body(items)
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
            end
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
          
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
            # Retrieve an RSS feed and process the item elements. Retrieved RSS data 
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
            # will be cached after every request using the Rails
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
            # ActiveSupport::Cache::FileStore mechanism.
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
            #
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
            # Tag Options:
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
            #   url: The url of the feed to be processed (required)
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
            #   limit: The maximum number of items to process (optional)
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
            #   refresh: The number of minutes to cache the data (optional)
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
            #
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
            # {ccml:rss:items url="<feed url>" limit="<max to display>" refresh="<cache time in minutes>"}
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
            #   Title: {title}<br />
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
            #   Link: {link}<br />
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
            #   Description: {description}<br />
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
            #   Publication Date: {date format='%m-%d-%Y %I:%M %p'}<br />
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
            # {/ccml:rss:items}
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          1
          
            def items
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          8
          
              rss = parse_rss
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
              
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          8
          
              if rss.nil?
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          5
          
                raise CCML::Error::ExternalSourceError, "RSS feed url: #{@opts[:url]} is not valid."
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
              end
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
          
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          3
          
              items = []
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          3
          
              limit = [rss.items.size, @opts[:limit].to_i].min
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          3
          
              limit = rss.items.size if limit == 0
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
          
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          3
          
              (0..limit-1).each do |i|
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          27
          
                items << (parse_item(rss.items[i]))
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
              end
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          3
          
              return process_tag_body(items)
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
            end
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
          
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
            # Retrieve an RSS feed and process the channel elements. This tag will
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
            # iterate only once no matter how many items have been retrieved.
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
            # Retrieved RSS data will be cached after every request using the Rails
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
            # ActiveSupport::Cache::FileStore mechanism.
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
            #
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
            # Tag Options:
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
            #   url: The url of the feed to be processed (required)
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
            #   refresh: The number of minutes to cache the data (optional)
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
            #
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
            # {ccml:rss:channel url="<feed url>" refresh="<cache time in minutes>"}
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
            #   RSS Version: {rss_version}<br />
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
            #   RSS Feed Version: {rss_feed_version}<br />
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
            #   RSS Feed Type: {rss_feed_type}<br />
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
            #   Title: {title}<br />
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
            #   Description: {description}<br />
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
            #   Copyright: {copyright}<br />
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
            #   Link: {link}<br />
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
            #   Language: {language}<br />
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
            #   Publication Date: {date format='%m-%d-%Y %I:%M %p'}<br />
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
            #   Image Title: {image_title}<br />
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
            #   Image URL: {image_url}<br />
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
            #   Image Link: {image_link}<br />
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
            #   Image Description: {image_description}<br />
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
            #   Image Height: {image_height}<br />
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
            #   Image Width: {item_width}<br />
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
            #   Item Count: {item_count}<br />
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
            # {/ccml:rss:channel}
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          1
          
            def channel
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          1
          
              rss = parse_rss
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          1
          
              if rss.nil?
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                return nil
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
              else
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          1
          
                return process_tag_body(parse_channel(rss))
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
              end
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
            end
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
          
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          1
          
            private
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
          
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          1
          
            def parse_item(rss, prefix = '')
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          115
          
              item = {
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                "#{prefix}title" => rss.title,
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                "#{prefix}link" => rss.link,
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                "#{prefix}description" => rss.description,
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                "#{prefix}date" => rss.date,
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
              }
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          115
          
              return item
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
            end
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
          
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          1
          
            def parse_channel(rss, prefix = '')
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          8
          
              channel = { }
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          8
          
              channel["rss_version"] = rss.version
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          8
          
              channel["rss_feed_version"] = rss.feed_version
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          8
          
              channel["rss_feed_type"] = rss.feed_type
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          8
          
              channel["#{prefix}title"] = rss.channel.title
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          8
          
              channel["#{prefix}description"] = rss.channel.description
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          8
          
              channel["#{prefix}copyright"] = rss.channel.copyright
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          8
          
              channel["#{prefix}link"] = rss.channel.link
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          8
          
              channel["#{prefix}language"] = rss.channel.language
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          8
          
              channel["#{prefix}date"] = rss.channel.date
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          8
          
              if rss.channel.image
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          8
          
                channel["#{prefix}image_title"] = rss.channel.image.title
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          8
          
                channel["#{prefix}image_url"] = rss.channel.image.url
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          8
          
                channel["#{prefix}image_link"] = rss.channel.image.link
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          8
          
                channel["#{prefix}image_description"] = rss.channel.image.description
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          8
          
                channel["#{prefix}image_height"] = rss.channel.image.width
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          8
          
                channel["#{prefix}image_width"] = rss.channel.image.height
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
              end
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          8
          
              channel["#{prefix}item_count"] = rss.channel.items.size
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          8
          
              return channel
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
            end
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
          
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          1
          
            def parse_rss
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
          
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
              # get the cache and refresh data
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          21
          
              cache_key = "#{CACHE_KEY}#{@opts[:url]}"
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          21
          
              cache = Rails.cache.fetch(cache_key)
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          21
          
              refresh = @opts[:refresh].to_i
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
          
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
              # check for existing and non-stale data for this url
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          21
          
              if cache.nil? or cache[:time] < refresh.minutes.ago
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
                # get new data
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          18
          
                content = ''
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          33
          
                open(@opts[:url]) do |s| content = s.read end
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          15
          
                rss = RSS::Parser.parse(content, false)
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
              else
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
                # use the cached data
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          3
          
                rss = cache[:rss]
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
              end
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
          
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
              # save the data back to the cache
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          17
          
              cache = {
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
                :time => Time.now,
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
                :rss => rss
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
              }
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          17
          
              Rails.cache.write(cache_key, cache)
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
          
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
            rescue TypeError, Errno::ENOENT => e
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          3
          
              rss = nil
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
            ensure
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          21
          
              return rss
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
            end
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
          
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
          end
        
      197.

          module CCML

          1
          
              class TagPair < Base
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          1
          
                attr_writer :tag_body
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
                IF_BLOCK_PATTERN = /\{if\s+.+?}.*?(\{if:elsif\s+.+?}.+?)*?(\{if:else}.+?)??\{\/if}/im
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
                IF_PATTERN = /\{if\s+(?<cond>.+?)}(?<body>.+?)\{\/?if/im
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
                ELSIF_PATTERN = /\{if:else?if\s+(?<cond>.+?)}(?<body>.+?)\{\/?if/im
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
                ELSE_PATTERN = /\{if:else}(?<body>.+?)\{\/if}/im
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
                VAR_PATTERN = /\{(?<vars>\S+?)(\s+format=['"](?<format>.*?)['"])?}/i
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
                ARRAY_PATTERN = /(?<method>\w+)(\[(?<index>\d+)\])/i
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
                def process_tag_body(data)
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
          
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                  # inputs and outputs
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          52
          
                  return_data = ''
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          52
          
                  data = [ data ] unless data.respond_to?(:each) and not data.is_a?(Hash)
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
          
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                  # iterate through all data items
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          52
          
                  data.each do |datum|
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                    # wrap the hash for later evaluation
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          175
          
                    datum = to_struct(datum) if datum.is_a?(Hash)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                    # process the tag body
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          175
          
                    tag_body = String.new(@tag_body.to_s)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          175
          
                    tag_body = process_conditionals(datum, tag_body)
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          175
          
                    tag_body = process_variables(datum, tag_body)
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                    # append to the output buffer
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          175
          
                    return_data << tag_body
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                  end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          52
          
                  return return_data
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                end
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          1
          
                private
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
                def evaluate_conditional(datum, if_match, match, tag_body)
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          14
          
                  sub = nil
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          14
          
                  begin
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          14
          
                    if datum.instance_eval(if_match[:cond])
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          5
          
                      sub = if_match[:body]
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          5
          
                      tag_body = tag_body.sub(match.to_s, sub)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                    end
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  rescue => error
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                    #puts "#{error.class} - #{error.message}"
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                  end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          14
          
                  return sub, tag_body
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
                def process_conditionals(datum, tag_body)
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                  # iterate through all the conditionals in the tag body
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          175
          
                  pos = 0
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          175
          
                  while match = IF_BLOCK_PATTERN.match(tag_body, pos)
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
          
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                    # process the 'if' conditional
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          7
          
                    if_match = IF_PATTERN.match(match.to_s)
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          7
          
                    sub, tag_body = evaluate_conditional(datum, if_match, match, tag_body)
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                    # process all 'elsif' conditionals
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          7
          
                    if sub.nil?
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          4
          
                      pos = 0
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          4
          
                      while if_match = ELSIF_PATTERN.match(match.to_s, pos)
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          7
          
                        sub, tag_body = evaluate_conditional(datum, if_match, match, tag_body)
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          7
          
                        sub ? break : pos = if_match.end(2)
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                      end
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                    end
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                    # process the else
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          7
          
                    if sub.nil? and if_match = ELSE_PATTERN.match(match.to_s)
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          2
          
                      sub = if_match[:body]
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          2
          
                      tag_body = tag_body.sub(match.to_s, sub)
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                    end
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
          
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                    # wipe the entire match if no conditional returned true
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          7
          
                    if sub.nil?
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                      sub = ''
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                      tag_body = tag_body.sub(match.to_s, sub)
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                    end
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
          
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                    # look for another match
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          7
          
                    pos = match.begin(0) + sub.length
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                  end
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
          
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          175
          
                  return tag_body
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                end
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
          
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          1
          
                def process_variables(datum, tag_body)
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
          
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                  # iterate through all vars in the tag body
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          175
          
                  pos = 0
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          175
          
                  while match = VAR_PATTERN.match(tag_body, pos)
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
          
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                    # get the variable call string
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1413
          
                    vars = match[:vars]
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                    # get the variable data
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          1413
          
                    begin
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          1413
          
                      methods = vars.split('.')
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          1413
          
                      object = datum
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          1413
          
                      (0 .. methods.size-1).each do |i|
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          1420
          
                        arymtch = ARRAY_PATTERN.match(methods[i])
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          1420
          
                        if arymtch.nil?
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          1413
          
                          object = object.send(methods[i].to_sym)
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                        else
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          7
          
                          object = object.send(arymtch[:method].to_sym)
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          7
          
                          object = object[arymtch[:index].to_i]
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                        end
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                      end
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          1405
          
                      sub = object
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                    rescue => error
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                      #puts "#{error.class} - #{error.message}"
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          8
          
                      sub = nil
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                    end
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
          
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                    # check for date format
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                    #TODO Make timezone aware. Parse and format functions
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                    #     look at GMT vs. local differently - Jerry
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          1413
          
                    if match[:format]
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          129
          
                      begin
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          129
          
                        sub = Time.parse(sub) unless sub.is_a?(Time)
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          128
          
                        sub = sub.strftime(match[:format])
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                      rescue => error
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                        #puts "#{error.class} - #{error.message}"
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                      end
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                    end
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
          
        
      132. 
      
        
    132.

      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1413

      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          1413

      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
          
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                    # look for another match
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          1413
          
                    pos = match.begin(0) + sub.length
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                  end
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
          
        
      140.

          175

      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                end
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
          
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          1
          
                def to_struct(item)
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          135
          
                  struct = OpenStruct.new(item)
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          135
          
                  item.each do |key, value|
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          1910
          
                    if value.is_a? Hash
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          2
          
                      obj = to_struct(value)
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          2
          
                      struct.send("#{key}=".to_sym, obj)
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                    elsif value.is_a? Array
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          2
          
                      value = struct.send(key.to_sym)
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          2
          
                      (0 .. value.size-1).each do |i|
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          7
          
                        value[i] = to_struct(value[i]) if value[i].is_a? Hash
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                      end
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                    end
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                  end
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          135
          
                  return struct
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
                end
        
      158. 
      
        
    158.

      159.

    1. 
          
          
          # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          
          
          
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          # Ingester is a tool for ingesting the transcript of a Conversation
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
          #
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          # Ingester.build takes in a transcript text in a mini DSL which is 
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          # parsed and returns a collection of Ingester::Dialogs representing
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          # the parsed Contribution to the Conversation
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          #
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
          # Example transcript
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
          # speaker "John Foo"
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
          # dialog <<-enddialog
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
          # Hello my name is John Foo. Today I will be discussing the case for private wells with home owner Betty Bar.
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          # enddialog
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          # 
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
          # speaker "Betty Bar"
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
          # dialog <<-enddialog
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          # Hi John, thanks for allowing me to a be a part of this discussion.
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
          # enddialog
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
          #
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
          #
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
          # The above transcript would be parsed into 2 Dialog structs:
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          # [ #<struct Ingester::Dialog speaker="John Foo", time=nil,
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          #   content="Hello my name is John Foo. Today I will be discussing the case for private wells with home owner Betty Bar.">,
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          #   #<struct Ingester::Dialog speaker="Betty Bar", time=nil,
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          #   content="Hi John, thanks for allowing me to a be a part of this discussion."> ]
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          #
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
          #
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
          # When Ingester.ingest encounters an error it wraps the original exception so
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          # it can be accessed later and raises an Ingester::Error with info regarding
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
          # the error encountered.
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          #
        
      32.

          class Ingester

            def self.ingest(string)
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          24
          
              begin
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          24
          
                string = munge(string)
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          24
          
                DSL.build(string)
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          16
          
              rescue => e
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          16
          
                friendly_exception_info = parse_exception(e)
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          16

      57.

      62.

            # Handles problems from Copying and Pasting from Microsoft Word into plain

            def self.munge(string)
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
              # Replace all ISO-8859-1 or CP1252 characters by their UTF-8 equivalent
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
              # resulting in a valid UTF-8 string
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          24
          
              chars = ActiveSupport::Multibyte::Chars.new(string).tidy_bytes
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
              
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
              # Replace \r and \r\n with \n
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          24
          
              chars = chars.gsub("\r\n", "\r").gsub("\r", "\n\n")
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
          
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
              # Replace “smart quotes” with "normal quotes"
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          24
          
              chars = chars.gsub(/[”“]/, '"').gsub(/[‘’]/, "'")
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
          
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
              # Convert back to a string
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          24
          
              chars.to_s
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
            end
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
          
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
            # Helper method that takes an exception and makes a friendlier
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
            # error containing the approximate line number in the string of
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
            # text to Ingest
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
            #
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
            # example exception format:
        
      85.

      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
            # becomes
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
            #
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
            # Error ingesting transcript; NameError: undefined local variable or method `foo'
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
            #

          1
          
            def self.parse_exception(exception)
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          16
          
              message = exception.message
        
      92. 
      
        
    92.

          121
          
              if exception.backtrace.detect{|l| l =~/IngesterTranscript:(\d+)/}
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          14
          
                line_info = "Error ingesting transcript around line #{$1}"
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              else
        
      96.

          2

              end

      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
            
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
            # Simple struct for holding a particular "Contribution" of an

            # ingested transcript
        
      106.

          1
          
            class Dialog < Struct.new(:speaker, :time, :content)

          1

      108.

      111.

      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
            # Mini DSL for parsing the conversation text. Extends BasicObject
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
            # to help protect against injection like Kernel#exit
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          1
          
            class DSL < BasicObject
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
              # 
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          1
          
              def self.build(string)
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          24
          
                builder = new
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          24
          
                builder.instance_eval(string, "IngesterTranscript", 1)
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          10
          
                if builder.current_dialog.partial_dialog?
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          2
          
                  builder.raise_illegal_state "Expected a dialog."
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                end
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          8
          
                builder.dialogs
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
              end
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
              
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
          
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
              # represents the current dialog being read/parsed by DSL
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          1
          
              attr_reader :current_dialog
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
          
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
              # represents an Array of Dialogs that have been read/parsed.
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
              # Dialogs is oredered earliest parsed to latest.
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          1
          
              attr_reader :dialogs

    132.

      134.

      135.

          1
          
              def initialize
        
      136.

                @dialogs = []
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          24
          
                @current_dialog = Dialog.new
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
              end
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
          
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
              # Sets teh speaker of the current dialog.
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
              # Raises an error if name is nil or blank or if the
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
              # current dialog already has a speaker.
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
              #
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          1
          
              def speaker(name=nil)
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          160
          
                if name.nil? || name.blank?
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          3
          
                  raise_illegal_state "You must provide a speaker." 
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                elsif @current_dialog.speaker
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1
          
                  raise_illegal_state "Expected a dialog or time."
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                end
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          156
          
                @current_dialog.speaker = name.strip
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
              end
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
          
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
              # Sets the time for the current dialog.
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
              # Raises an error if time is nil or blank or if the
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
              # current dialog already has a time.
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
              #
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          1
          
              def time(_time=nil)
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          9
          
                if _time.nil? || _time.blank?
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          3
          
                  raise_illegal_state "You must provide a time."
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                elsif @current_dialog.time
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          1
          
                  raise_illegal_state "Time has already been set."
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                end
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          5
          
                @current_dialog.time = _time
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
              end
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
          
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
              # sets the content for the dialog.
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
              # Raises an error if content is nil or blnak or if
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
              # the current dialog does not have a speaker or
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
              # already has content.
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
              #
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          1
          
              def dialog(content=nil)
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          155
          
                if content.nil? || content.blank?
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          3
          
                  raise_illegal_state "You must provide a dialog."
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
                elsif @current_dialog.speaker.nil? || @current_dialog.content
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          2
          
                  raise_illegal_state "Expected a speaker before dialog."
        
      176. 
      
        
    176.

      177. 
      
        
    177.

      178. 
      
        
    178.

      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          150
          
                @current_dialog = Dialog.new
        
      180.

    lib/parent_validator.rb

          class ParentValidator < ActiveModel::Validator
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          1
          
            def validate(record)
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
              record.errors[:base] << "This record has no valid parent" unless check(record)
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
            end
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
            private
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          1
          
              def check(record)
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                # parent record types are:
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                # 0 - bogus, who knows
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                # 1 - comment
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                # 2 - event
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                # 3 - question
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                # 4 - answer
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                (record.parent_type >= 1) && (record.parent_type <= 4)
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
              end
        
      15. 
      
        
    15.

          module Utilities

            ##
        
      3.

            # Contains methods that are meant to manipulate Conversation

          1
          
            module ConversationUtilities
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
              ##
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
              # This method flips through all conversations and looks for any Issues
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
              # that are associated with them.  If there are, then the Topics from
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
              # those issues are set for the conversation.
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              #
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              # No change is made in the relationship between the Conversation and
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
              # Issue records.  Only Topic relationships are added.
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
              #
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
              # In case the Topics for a Conversation have been set already, no 
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              # Topic relationships are removed.  Topics are only added based upon
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
              # any existing relationship between the Conversation and an Issue.
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              #
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
              # @param [Boolean] commit Whether or not to commit changes to the 
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              #   database.  Default is +false+, which is essentially a dry run
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              #
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              # @param [ActiveSupport::BufferedLogger] logger Where to output all
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
              #   of the status messages. It doesn't have to be a BufferedLogger, but
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              #   does need to implement the +info+ method; uses the Rails.logger
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
              #   by default
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              #

      27.

              #   conversations to process.  If not provided, then all conversations
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
              #   with relationships to Issues are fetched and processed.
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
              def self.set_topics_from_issues(commit = false, logger = Rails.logger, conversations = [])
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          5
          
                start = Time.now
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          5
          
                if conversations.empty?
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          3
          
                  conversations = Conversation.joins(:issues)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          3
          
                  if conversations.empty?
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                    logger.info('There are 0 conversations to process.', 'ConversationUtilities')
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                    return
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                  end
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                end
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          5
          
                logger.info("Processing #{conversations.count} conversations . . . ")
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                # Iterate through the conversations
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          5
          
                conversations.each do |conversation|
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          14
          
                  logger.info("Processing conversation (#{conversation.id}) - #{conversation.title} . . . ", 'ConversationUtilities')
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                  # Get a list of the topics that are associated with the conversation
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          14
          
                  all_issues = conversation.issues(true)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          42
          
                  all_topics = all_issues.collect { |i| i.topic_ids }
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          14
          
                  all_topics.flatten!
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          14
          
                  all_topics.uniq!
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          14
          
                  if all_topics.empty?
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                    logger.info("    No topics to add.")
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                    next
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                  end
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          14
          
                  logger.info("    Topics to be added (ids):  #{all_topics.inspect}")
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          14
          
                  all_topics.each do |topic_id|
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          28
          
                    topic = Topic.find(topic_id)
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
          
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          28
          
                    if conversation.topics.include?(topic)
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          8
          
                      logger.info("    Conversation already has topic (#{topic.id}) #{topic.name}")
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                    elsif commit == false
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          8
          
                      logger.info("    Topic (#{topic.id}) #{topic.name} would have been added. No changes saved.", 'ConversationUtilities')
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                    else
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          12
          
                      logger.info("    Adding topic (#{topic.id}) #{topic.name}", 'ConversationUtilities')
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          12
          
                      conversation.topics << topic unless conversation.topics.include?(topic)
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                    end
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                  end
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
          
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          5
          
                logger.info(" ---------------------------------------------------")
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          5
          
                logger.info("Finish processing #{conversations.count} conversations in #{Time.now - start} seconds")
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
              end
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
            end

                    to_person.content_items_people = from_person.content_items_people
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                    
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          11
          
                    debug_print 'updated: ' + pluralize(updated_record_count, 'record')
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          11
          
                    debug_print 'end:     updating content_items'
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
          
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          11
          
                    debug_print 'begin:   updating managed_issue_pages'
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          11
          
                    updated_record_count = 0
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          11
          
                    from_person.managed_issue_pages.map do |managed_issue_page|
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          1
          
                      managed_issue_page.person_id = to_person.id
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          1
          
                      managed_issue_page.save!
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          1
          
                      updated_record_count += 1
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                    end
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          11
          
                    debug_print 'updated: ' + pluralize(updated_record_count, 'record')
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          11
          
                    debug_print 'end:     updating managed_issue_pages'
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
          
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                  end # to_person.transaction
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
          
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                rescue ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid => exception
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                  debug_print exception.message
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                  debug_print exception.backtrace.join("\n")
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                end # begin
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
          
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          11
          
                debug_print 'ending rake task'
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          11
          
                return Person.find(from_person.id).confirmed_at.nil?
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
              end
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
          
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
            end
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
          end
        
      133.
